summary: I focused on improving the stability of the local LLM infrastructure. This involved troubleshooting Docker container networking issues and refactoring the `cognizer.py` module to better handle log parsing.
activities: Investigated Docker networking issues causing `Connection Refused` in `chromadb` container
Refactored `cognizer.py` to support dynamic sample loading
Updated `docker-compose.yml` to expose port 8000 for local debugging
Reviewed GitHub issue #12 regarding `sensor.py` memory leaks
Documented the new RAG architecture in `docs/architecture.md`
learnings: Docker Networking: Containers on the same bridge network should use container names as hostnames, not `localhost`
Python Testing: `pytest` requires `__init__.py` in test directories to correctly resolve imports
